original_title: Jon Lord with The Hoochie Coochie Men: Live at The Basement
overview: Deep Purple's Jon Lord performs live at The Basement in Sydney in this exclusive concert alongside The Hoochie Coochie Men (Bob Daisley - bass, Tim Gaze - guitar and vocals, Rob Grosser - drums, Jim Conway - harmonica). Special Guest: Jimmy Barnes.
title: Jon Lord with The Hoochie Coochie Men: Live at The Basement
